name: TrouvaIdle
description:
TrouvaIdle

Play an idle game in the background in the world of Trouvaille that's experiencing a long night. Use different light sources available to attract various attention. 

Features:
  • 16 different opponents
  • Upgrade attack damage and speed
  • Gamble with dices
  • Screen optimizations
  • Background music
  • Fun when bored
Support:

Feel free to fund my future work on itch or on ko-fi
